channel.title: CiTR -- Duncan's Donuts
channel.description: Duncans Donuts is a radio show on CiTR 101.9fm on Thursdays from noon to 1pm. Listen to it via streaming mp3 from our website, via podcast orif youre in the Vancouver areaat 101.9 on your FM dial.
channel.itunes:summary: Duncans Donuts is a radio show on CiTR 101.9fm on Thursdays from noon to 1pm. Listen to it via streaming mp3 from our website, via podcast orif youre in the Vancouver areaat 101.9 on your FM dial.
